# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib4.lib ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lib4.lib ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib3.lib ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lib3.lib ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test2_nolib.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test2_nolib.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test2.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test2.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test2.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test2.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test2.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rlc.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rlc.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rlc.cir.options ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.options ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rlc.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rlc.lib ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.lib ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} rlc.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rlc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;errorexit;bug907")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 30)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh COMMAND bash test2.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} test2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bug907")
